ai-tha-ap477:1.2_0: such a one, the great hermit,
ai-tha-ap477:1.3_0: after seeing the bowl of water,
ai-tha-ap477:1.4_0: I filled the grass with my hand
ai-tha-ap477:2.2_0: and the food that was given to me.
ai-tha-ap477:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap477:2.4_0: this is the fruit of the unloved.
ai-tha-ap477:4.1_0: It was so welcome for me
ai-tha-ap477:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kusinārā.
